function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High fear of COVID-19 due to pre-existing conditions","Impact":"Increased anxiety and avoidance of COVID-19 news","Mitigation":"Provide mental health support and accurate information","Technologies":"Telemedicine, mental health apps","People":"Individuals with pre-existing conditions","Owner":"Healthcare professionals, mental health professionals"},{"Description":"Avoidance of news about COVID-19","Impact":"Decreased awareness and knowledge of pandemic developments","Mitigation":"Encourage balanced news consumption and fact-checking","Technologies":"Media literacy tools, fact-checking websites","People":"General public","Owner":"Media organizations, fact-checking platforms"},{"Description":"Losing interest in news about COVID-19","Impact":"Reduced awareness and preparedness for pandemic","Mitigation":"Education on the importance of staying informed","Technologies":"Educational campaigns, public announcements","People":"General public","Owner":"Health authorities, government agencies"}]}
